name: Urban Massage
slogan: Making wellness accessible to the masses
description: Our world-class platforms enable brilliantly talented therapists to provide caring treatments to customers wherever and whenever they want a well deserved treat.  Our online marketplace connects self employed therapists with users at home, business or on the go.  Need a massage in the next 1 hour? Our platform can solve that problem for you.  Don't want to travel to a spa? Want that massage in the comfort of your own home - our fantastic tech solves these problems, from incredible logistic algorithms to a great UX, tech is at the heart of what we do.

jobs.title: Marketing Lead - Paris.
jobs.description:
Urban is an on-demand wellness company, that currently offers massage and osteopathy at home in London and Paris. Over the next few months, we are also launching skincare and fitness services.

This is an full time role in the Paris office, focusing on a diverse range of initiatives to understand what influences user behaviour and demand growth at Urban. The ideal person will accelerate our growth in Paris through driving awareness of our multiple categories to our target market.



Responsibilities

Spread the word! Increase our awareness and consideration levels in Paris.
Acquire new users.
Get to know our user base, their demographics and their characteristic, and what influences their buying behaviour.
Understand the wider market trends within the verticals in which we operate.
Support the Global Marketing team by providing insights to improve marketing performance in Paris.
Engage possible partnerships to drive revenues in Paris.
Responsible for PR in Paris.
Responsible for organising and driving offline activities in Paris.
Work with central team to optimise digital ads in Paris.
